thread.section_title: Rosewood Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Will like to stay there again
thread.title_full: Will like to stay there again - Review of Rosewood Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Lau_traveller
title: Will like to stay there again
text: The hotel is new and reasonably priced. Staff were very friendly. The room is modern, the internet is fast, the bed is comfortable, the switch is simple and worked fine. The speaker has a clock display. There's mouthwash. The bathtub is too big and it will take a lot of water and time to fill that up. The breakfast is good as well. I will go again.
